title: Frigidaire Top Freezer Refrigerator FFTR1821QW Tour
description:
In this video we take a look at the FFTR1821QW refrigerator from Frigidaire.  For more information on this refrigerator or to make a purchase check it out at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/product/84520/Frigidaire-White-Top-Freezer-Refrigerator-FFTR1821QW.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=FFTR1821QW_20170126&utm_medium=video 

Features:
- Independent Temperature Controls
- Built with American Pride: Designed, enginereed and assembled in the U.S.A. Appliances that are high-performing, more accessible, and more innovative than ever
- Store-More™ Humidity-Controlled Crisper Drawers: Keep your fruits and vegetables fresh in our humidity-controlled crisper drawers
- Store-More™ Gallon Door Shelf: Door storage gives you room for larger items like a gallon of milk
- Full-Width Freezer Rack: Enjoy more usable space and better organization
- Ready-Select® Controls: Easily select options with the touch of a button
- Color-Coordinated Door Hinge Covers
- Clear Dairy Door
- Reversible Door: Door can be installed to open left or right based on your needs
- Clear Dairy Bin: Keep foods like butter, cheese and yogurt organized
- Garage Ready*: Our top freezer offers the flexibility to work in your home or in your garage. It's built to handle extreme temperature conditions (*Down to 34° F)
- Capacity (Cu. Ft.): 18.0
- Fresh Food Capacity (Cu. Ft.): 14.1
 -Freezer Capacity (Cu. Ft.): 3.98
- Total Shelf Area (Sq. Ft.): 22.5
- Fresh Food Shelf Area (Sq. Ft.): 16.2
- Freezer Shelf Area (Sq. Ft.): 6.3
